Data Science for the Environment — Lecture Notes & Labs 1 Welcome 1.1 Acknolwedgements

Data Science for the Environment — Lecture Notes & Labs Lauren Ponisio 1 Welcome This book accompanies the Fall 2025 course BI 410/510L - Data Science for the Environment, taught by Prof. Lauren Ponisio. The course equips students with practical skills to reproducibly analyze environmental data. 1.1 Acknolwedgements In the spirit of open science, many of these lessons were inspired by other courses, including Carl Boettiger (Lab 2, Climate change), Chris Paciorek(regular expressions, debugging) Software carpentry (Spatial labs, git).
